name: the coziest memory
notes:
> **please note: i do not offer pattern support for my free patterns!**

**now available as a printable pdf in both english and french! if you would like to aid me in translating this pattern into more languages, please email me directly at junkyarn@gmail.com**

this recipe is more of a combination of several patterns and ideas that i tweaked to suit my needs. additionally, i heard the term "cozy memories blanket" first from molly of [a homespun house][1] but the "memory blanket" concept has been around for ages. 

this recipe makes use of any 5 to 6 gram leftover sock yarn scraps you might have. you can make this blanket as small or large as you like.

each square is roughly 3.5" on each side.

special thanks to [joyfulpopup](person) for translating the coziest memory into french and providing the pdf. (you can find her [coziest memory blanket here][2]!)


  [1]: http://ahomespunhouse.com/
  [2]: http://www.ravelry.com/projects/joyfulpopup/the-coziest-memory
